amendment.description: To require a report on the re-engining of E-8C Joint Surveillance and Target Attack Radar System (Joint STARS) aircraft.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1765 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1765 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Chambliss. (consideration: CR S8005-8017; text: CR S8016) To require a report on the re-engining of E-8C Joint Surveillance and Target Attack Radar System (Joint STARS) aircraft.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1765 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1765 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Chambliss.
